commit message:
Issue 150: sub date/time options in preferences menu do not auto-disable
- Disable items based on other preferences were necessary.

Issue 151: handling of disabled formats entirely
- Properly handle empty format-strings

Issue 155: category totals often don't update correctly
- Fixed

Issue 140: View image captions
- XKCD here I come.

Issue 140: View image captions
- Modified parsing, now using a real html parser instead of some freakish regex.
Fixed rotation of article with dark background
Fixed starred/published articles from external source
Issue 145: starred list won't fully sync

Temporary workaround for Issue 144: No menu button when viewing articles
- Added preference to enable Actionbar in articleview

== Version 1.50 ==
* Fixed Issue 150: sub date/time options in preferences menu do not auto-disable
* Fixed Issue 151: handling of disabled date/time format string
* Fixed Issue 155: category totals often don't update correctly
* Fixed Issue 140: View image captions (longpress on image)
* Fixed rotation of article with dark background
* Fixed Issue 145: starred list won't fully sync
* Temporary workaround for Issue 144: No menu button when viewing articles
